definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]

sentences.english: Treatment generally consists of IV or sub-cutaneous fluids and antibiotics.
sentences.chinese: 治疗通常包括IV或者皮下注射和抗生素。

sentences.english: Hypodermic needles stuck in my shoes as I walked over to take the photo.
sentences.chinese: 当我步行去拍摄时，皮下注射的针头扎进了我的鞋子。

sentences.english: The rats of normal control group were also subcutaneously injected the saline solution with the same dosage.
sentences.chinese: 正常对照组同法皮下注射相应剂量生理盐水。

sentences.english: Stem cells were mobilized with granulocyte colony-stimulating factor from HLA-identical sibling donors.
sentences.chinese: 供者采用粒细胞集落刺激因子皮下注射动员干细胞。

sentences.english: After injecting astragalus in the points, prepared model by hypodermic injection of scopolamine.
sentences.chinese: 穴位注射黄芪注射液后，皮下注射东莨菪碱造模。

sentences.english: We always have to carry a hypodermic of adrenalin wherever we go.
sentences.chinese: 不管我们到哪里，都会带着皮下注射的肾上腺素。

sentences.english: The difference with injection into the skin is "staggering, " Hoffman says. "It was an 'aha' moment, " Seder adds.
sentences.chinese: 这跟皮下注射给药的差别实在是惊人，霍夫曼说。

sentences.english: He snatched up the hypodermic syringe and plunged it in.
sentences.chinese: 他抓过皮下注射器，把它刺入皮肤。

sentences.english: This is a medical supplies company that produces disposable hypodermic syringes .
sentences.chinese: 这是一家生产多用途皮下注射器的药材公司。

sentences.english: Insulin glargine is approved for once-a-day dosage by subcutaneous injection (injection under the skin).
sentences.chinese: 甘精胰岛素被批准为每日一次皮下注射。

definition: to take medicine orally/oral (contraceptive etc)/to say that one is convinced
to drip into/to transfuse/to percolate/to drip feed/fig. to instill
